snippet.title: Web sites that work : secrets from winning web sites
snippet.description: Web sites that work : secrets from winning web sites / Smith, Jon Leading web site entrepreneur Jon Smith has condensed the secrets of his success into 52 inspiring ideas that even the most hopeless technophobe can implement [...] Oxford : Infinite Ideas, 2012. - 257 p.

snippet.title: BlackBerry PlayBook For Dummies
snippet.description: BlackBerry PlayBook For Dummies / Sandler, Corey Use your BlackBerry PlayBook for work and for play—this book shows you how For all you business road warriors who don't go anywhere without your BlackBerrys, the road just got a little more comfortable [...] Hoboken, NJ : John Wiley & Sons, 2011. - 355 p.
